solution_line_template: Tom is currently two times older than Ann, which means he is {ann_age} * {tom_multiplier} = <<{ann_age}*{tom_multiplier}={tom_age}>>{tom_age} years old.
In ten years Ann is going to be {ann_age} + {years_later} = {ann_future_age} years old.
And Tom is going to be {tom_age} + {years_later} = <<{tom_age}+{years_later}={tom_future_age}>>{tom_future_age} years old.
So the sum of their ages will be {ann_future_age} + {tom_future_age} = <<{ann_future_age}+{tom_future_age}={sum_ages}>>{sum_ages}.
